actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the investment tax credit for qualified farm property to 15 percent, effective as of January 1, 1976.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an investment tax credit for qualified farm property equal to 15 percent of the new investment.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the investment tax credit for qualified farm property to 15 percent, effective as of January 1, 1976.
